name: Thomas F. SMITH, Jr., et al. v. CUMBERLAND SCHOOL COMMITTEE et al.

parties: Thomas F. SMITH, Jr., et al. v. CUMBERLAND SCHOOL COMMITTEE et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The motion for expedited hearing is granted. This case is assigned to the December, 1979 calendar for oral argument.

attorneys: Oster, Groff & Prescott, George M. Prescott, Lincoln, for plaintiffs.

Dennis J. Roberts, II, Atty. Gen., Forrest Avila, Special Asst. Atty. Gen., James M. Shannahan, Marcia L. McGair, S. Arlene Violet, Consultant Atty., R. I. Protection & Advocacy System, Inc., Providence, for defendants.
casebody.head_matter:
Thomas F. SMITH, Jr., et al. v. CUMBERLAND SCHOOL COMMITTEE et al.
No. 79-22-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Nov. 16, 1979.
Oster, Groff & Prescott, George M. Prescott, Lincoln, for plaintiffs.
Dennis J. Roberts, II, Atty. Gen., Forrest Avila, Special Asst. Atty. Gen., James M. Shannahan, Marcia L. McGair, S. Arlene Violet, Consultant Atty., R. I. Protection & Advocacy System, Inc., Providence, for defendants.
